title: Beginning Stress Testing�s New Chapter
content: - 5 -   supervisory findings through the examination process, and would be at risk of a ratings   downgrade or enforcement action if those deficiencies were sufficiently material.   Conclusion   These changes are aimed at preserving the foundation laid over nearly a decade of   stress testing experience, including by many of the people in this room.  Our goal is to   bolster the program’s credibility by increasing its transparency, simplicity, and stability,   while maintaining the strength of the supervisory and internal stress testing elements that   are central to the program today.  These adjustments will be coupled with our continued   commitment to strong supervision, and our expectation that financial institutions manage   their risks and hold sufficient capital to continue operations through times of stress.  I   look forward to hearing your insights into these changes, and I thank you for your time.
